price: 3. Butu ya mokano ezali malamu koleka sanza koto moko.
arabic: لَيۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرٖ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: laylatu al-qadri khayrun min alfi shahrin
